attributes.action: enforce equal rights to children for fathers who pay their csa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the moment the father of a child has no rights. If an absent father wilfully pays the csa he should have equal rights to the mother without her having any say except in abuse or violent circumstances. If the mother who is usually on benefits refuses all csa payments are to be stopped and the mother made to work for her benefits
